1: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> בָּרֲכִ֣י <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Bless</n> נַ֭פְשִׁי <sup>5315 </sup> <n>O my soul</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> קְ֝רָבַ֗י <sup>7130 </sup> <n>and all that is within</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>me [bless] his holy</n>
2: בָּרֲכִ֣י <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Bless</n> נַ֭פְשִׁי <sup>5315 </sup> <n>O my soul</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תִּ֝שְׁכְּחִ֗י <sup>7911 </sup> <n>and forget</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> גְּמוּלָֽיו׃ <sup>1576 </sup> <n>not all his benefits</n>
3: הַסֹּלֵ֥חַ <sup>5545 </sup> <n>Who forgiveth</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲוֹנֵ֑כִי <sup>5771 </sup> <n>all thine iniquities</n> הָ֝רֹפֵ֗א <sup>7495 </sup> <n>who healeth</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> תַּחֲלֻאָֽיְכִי׃ <sup>8463 </sup> <n>all thy diseases</n>
4: הַגּוֹאֵ֣ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>Who redeemeth</n> מִשַּׁ֣חַת <sup>7845 </sup> <n>from destruction</n> חַיָּ֑יְכִי <sup>2416 </sup> <n>thy life</n> הַֽ֝מְעַטְּרֵ֗כִי <sup>5849 </sup> <n>who crowneth</n> חֶ֣סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>thee with lovingkindness</n> וְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <sup>7356 </sup> <n>and tender mercies</n>
5: הַמַּשְׂבִּ֣יַע <sup>7646 </sup> <n>Who satisfieth</n> בַּטּ֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>with good</n> עֶדְיֵ֑ךְ <sup>5716 </sup> <n>thy mouth</n> תִּתְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <sup>2318 </sup> <n>is renewed</n> כַּנֶּ֣שֶׁר <sup>5404 </sup> <n>like the eagle's</n> נְעוּרָֽיְכִי׃ <sup>5271 </sup> <n>[things so that] thy youth</n>
6: עֹשֵׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>executeth</n> צְדָק֣וֹת <sup>6666 </sup> <n>righteousness</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and judgment</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> עֲשׁוּקִֽים׃ <sup>6231 </sup> <n>for all that are oppressed</n>
7: יוֹדִ֣יעַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>He made known</n> דְּרָכָ֣יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>his ways</n> לְמֹשֶׁ֑ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>unto Moses</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto the children</n> יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עֲלִילֽוֹתָיו׃ <sup>5949 </sup> <n>his acts</n>
8: רַח֣וּם <sup>7349 </sup> <n>[is] merciful</n> וְחַנּ֣וּן <sup>2587 </sup> <n>and gracious</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> אֶ֖רֶךְ <sup>750 </sup> <n>slow</n> אַפַּ֣יִם <sup>639 </sup> <n>to anger</n> וְרַב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and plenteous</n> חָֽסֶד׃ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>in mercy</n>
9: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> לָנֶ֥צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>He will not always</n> יָרִ֑יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>chide</n> וְלֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[his anger] for ever</n> יִטּֽוֹר׃ <sup>5201 </sup> <n>neither will he keep</n>
10: לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> כַ֭חֲטָאֵינוּ <sup>2399 </sup> <n>with us after our sins</n> עָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>He hath not dealt</n> לָ֑נוּ וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> כַ֝עֲוֹנֹתֵ֗ינוּ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>us according to our iniquities</n> גָּמַ֥ל <sup>1580 </sup> <n>nor rewarded</n> עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
11: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>as</n> כִגְבֹ֣הַּ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>is high above</n> שָׁ֭מַיִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>For as the heaven</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>are above</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> גָּבַ֥ר <sup>1396 </sup> <n>[so] great</n> חַ֝סְדּ֗וֹ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>is his mercy</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>toward</n> יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <sup>3373 </sup> <n>toward them that fear</n>
12: כִּרְחֹ֣ק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>As far as</n> מִ֭זְרָח <sup>4217 </sup> <n>the east</n> מִֽמַּֽעֲרָ֑ב <sup>4628 </sup> <n>is from the west</n> הִֽרְחִ֥יק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>[so] far hath he removed</n> מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּשָׁעֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>our transgressions</n>
13: כְּרַחֵ֣ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>pitieth</n> אָ֭ב <sup>1 </sup> <n>Like as a father</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> בָּנִ֑ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[his] children</n> רִחַ֥ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>pitieth</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[so] the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>that</n> יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <sup>3373 </sup> <n>them that fear</n>
14: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>Himself</n> יָדַ֣ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>For he knoweth</n> יִצְרֵ֑נוּ <sup>3336 </sup> <n>our frame</n> זָ֝כ֗וּר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>he remembereth</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָפָ֥ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>that we [are] dust</n> אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <sup>587 </sup> <n>ourselves</n>
15: אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>are like</n> כֶּחָצִ֣יר <sup>2682 </sup> <n>[are] as grass</n> יָמָ֑יו <sup>3117 </sup> <n>his days</n> כְּצִ֥יץ <sup>6731 </sup> <n>as a flower</n> הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יָצִֽיץ׃ <sup>6692 </sup> <n>so he flourisheth</n>
16: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>For the wind</n> עָֽבְרָה־ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>passeth over</n> בּ֣וֹ וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>is no</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ <sup>5234 </sup> <n>thereof shall know</n> ע֣וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>it and it is gone and the place</n>
17: וְחֶ֤סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>But the mercy</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[is] from everlasting</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to</n> ע֭וֹלָם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>everlasting</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> יְרֵאָ֑יו <sup>3373 </sup> <n>upon them that fear</n> וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>him and his righteousness</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto children's</n> בָנִֽים׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>children</n>
18: לְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <sup>8104 </sup> <n>To such as keep</n> בְרִית֑וֹ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>his covenant</n> וּלְזֹכְרֵ֥י <sup>2142 </sup> <n>and to those that remember</n> פִ֝קֻּדָ֗יו <sup>6490 </sup> <n>his commandments</n> לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n>
19: יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> בַּ֭שָּׁמַיִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>in the heavens</n> הֵכִ֣ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>hath prepared</n> כִּסְא֑וֹ <sup>3678 </sup> <n>his throne</n> וּ֝מַלְכוּת֗וֹ <sup>4438 </sup> <n>and his kingdom</n> בַּכֹּ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מָשָֽׁלָה׃ <sup>4910 </sup> <n>ruleth</n>
20: בָּרֲכ֥וּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Bless</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> מַלְאָ֫כָ֥יו <sup>4397 </sup> <n>ye his angels</n> גִּבֹּ֣רֵי <sup>1368 </sup> <n>that excel</n> כֹ֭חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>in strength</n> עֹשֵׂ֣י <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that do</n> דְבָר֑וֹ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his commandments</n> לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hearkening</n> בְּק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>unto the voice</n> דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>of his word</n>
21: בָּרֲכ֣וּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Bless</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> צְבָאָ֑יו <sup>6635 </sup> <n>all [ye] his hosts</n> מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <sup>8334 </sup> <n>[ye] ministers</n> עֹשֵׂ֥י <sup>6213 </sup> <n>of his that do</n> רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>his pleasure</n>
22: בָּרֲכ֤וּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Bless</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעֲשָׂ֗יו <sup>4639 </sup> <n>all his works</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מְקֹמ֥וֹת <sup>4725 </sup> <n>in all places</n> מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֑וֹ <sup>4475 </sup> <n>of his dominion</n> בָּרֲכִ֥י <sup>1288 </sup> <n>bless</n> נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>O my soul</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
